mapper.insert: insert into eden_board(category_no, user_no, board_title, board_content, board_readcount, board_write_date) VALUES (#{category_no}, #{user_no}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, 0, now())
insert into eden_board_like (user_no, board_no, like_date) values (#{user_no}, #{board_no}, now())

choose.when: select * from eden_board eb, eden_user eu where eb.user_no = eu.user_no and category_no = #{category_no} and board_title like '%' #{title} '%'
select * from eden_board eb, eden_user eu where eb.user_no = eu.user_no and board_title like '%' #{title} '%'
select * from eden_board eb, eden_user eu where eb.user_no = eu.user_no and category_no = #{category_no} and eb.board_content like '%' #{content} '%'
select * from eden_board eb, eden_user eu where eb.user_no = eu.user_no and eb.board_content like '%' #{content} '%'
select * from eden_board eb, eden_user eu where eb.user_no = eu.user_no and category_no = #{category_no} and eu.user_nickname like '%' #{nickname} '%'
select * from eden_board eb, eden_user eu where eb.user_no = eu.user_no and eu.user_nickname like '%' #{nickname} '%'
